backend/main.mo: Main canister actor defining user profile types, check-in data models, and brutal friend feedback messages with authorization mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading stored user profiles by adding streakTarget and achievementShownForThisTarget fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping streak-achievement and UI requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of all major frontend components and utilities.
frontend/CLEAN_REBUILD.md: Guide explaining how to perform a full clean rebuild of the frontend to resolve deployment issues.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for root-level frontend CSS.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint defining metadata, root mount element, and Usergeek analytics loader.
frontend/scripts/clean-rebuild.sh: Shell script that removes cached build artifacts, dependencies, and tool caches for a clean frontend rebuild.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, onboarding gating, user profile loading, and analytics identification/sync logic.
frontend/src/components/BeerDonationDial: A dialog showing a BTC donation address with copy-to-clipboard functionality and beer-themed messaging.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendDial: A dialog that displays a selected or random brutal motivational message using a large predefined list.
frontend/src/components/BrutalFriendFeed: A card that loads and displays the latest brutal friend feedback while tracking analytics and handling loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/ChanceOfDrinking: A card that shows a randomly generated drinking‑risk status with corresponding colors and styling.
Computes days until Friday and the next full moon to generate cycle-based friendly and brutal messages displayed in a card.
frontend/src/components/DailyCheckInDial: A dialog for daily sobriety check‑ins letting users report sober status, drink count, and mood, with validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/DataLoggedDialog: A generic confirmation dialog showing a message and variant-specific note after data is logged or updated.
frontend/src/components/DrinksChart.tsx: Renders a 14‑day bar chart of drink counts with update animations and loading states. Normalizes dates and builds chart data from aggregated entries.
frontend/src/components/FollowUpCheckInD: Provides a dialog for quick follow-up check-ins, allowing users to confirm sobriety or enter additional drinks. Handles validation and submission callbacks.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenLoadin: Displays a centered full-screen loading spinner with a simple message.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenStatus: Shows a full-screen error state when status fetch fails, offering retry and page refresh actions.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Catches unhandled React errors and shows a full-screen fallback UI with reload option and error details.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the top navigation header with branding and a logout button.
frontend/src/components/MoodIndicator.ts: Fetches recent mood data and displays an emoji and label based on the latest entry, with a loading state.
frontend/src/components/MotivationButton: Provides a button to fetch motivational messages with daily limits, opens a dialog, and tracks user clicks.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingFlow.t: Guides users through a multi-step onboarding form, validates responses, and submits profile data with analytics tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProgressStats.ts: Displays key progress metrics like sober days, streaks, and tracked days using styled statistic cards with icons.
frontend/src/components/RepeatCheckInDia: Modal for repeat daily check-ins allowing users to confirm sobriety or enter drink count with validation and state resets.
frontend/src/components/SoberDaysSection: Displays sober streak and target progress using metrics and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/StatusIndicators: Computes and shows today, yesterday, and weekly drinking status based on chart data.
frontend/src/components/StreakAchievemen: Full-screen overlay celebrating streak milestones and prompting user to pick a new target.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedHeaderSec: Header section showing brutal friend feedback and a motivation message button with rate limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, clearing identity, and tracking login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as user profiles, onboarding status, and check-ins with retry logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS layers and defines a brutalist theme with neon colors, utilities, and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard page, handling check-ins, user progress, achievements, dialogs, and related data fetching and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login page UI and triggers Internet Identity login with branding, animations, and loading states.
frontend/src/session/dailySessionFlow.ts: Implements a session-phase state machine and modal queue system for onboarding and daily check-in flows.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInAutoOpenG: Provides per-day sessionStorage guards to ensure the daily check-in dialog auto-opens only once per local day.
frontend/src/utils/sobrietyDuration.ts: Parses various sobriety duration strings into numeric day counts with a default fallback of 30 days.
frontend/src/utils/streakTargets.ts: Defines streak target options and converts selected targets into numeric day values.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL parameter extraction, persistence in sessionStorage, and safe cleanup from hash-based routing.
frontend/src/utils/usergeek.ts: Wraps UserGeek analytics with safety checks, deduplication, and helpers for events, page views, and dedupe keys.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the project's design system.
project_state.json: Describes the BRUTAL app state and planned streak-achievement feature requirements and constraints.
